list.title: Single Select
list.description: Single select without any options.

list.title: Multiple Select
list.description: Multiple select without any options.

list.title: Multiple Items
list.description: Use multiple and multipleWidth options to enable multiple items.

list.title: Auto Width
list.description: Auto width by default without setting width style.

list.title: Disabled Select
list.description: Show a disabled select width disabled attribute.

list.title: Selected/Disabled Options
list.description: Selected or Disabled options.

list.title: Submit Select
list.description: Submit select with name attribute in form.

list.title: The Data
list.description: Use data as data source.

list.title: The Locale
list.description: Use locale to set the locale.

list.title: Large Select
list.description: Large select with filter.

list.title: V-Model
list.description: Multiple select with v-model.

list.title: The Themes
list.description: Multiple select with bootstrap theme.

list.title: The Placeholder
list.description: Use placeholder attribute or placeholder: \'\' option to set placeholder.

list.title: Single Radio
list.description: Use singleRadio: true to show the radio input.

list.title: Hide Select All
list.description: Use selectAll: false to hide select all.

list.title: Hide Optgroup Check
list.description: Use hideOptgroupCheckboxes: true option to hide the optgroup checkboxes.

list.title: Custom Dropdown Width
list.description: Use dropWidth: 580 option to custom the dropdown width.

list.title: Max Height
list.description: Use maxHeight: 140 option to custom the dropdown max height.

list.title: Max Height Unit
list.description: Use maxHeightUnit: \'row\' option to set the max height unit.

list.title: The Position
list.description: Use position: \'top\' to set the select dropdown in top position.

list.title: Display Values
list.description: Use displayValues: true option to display selected values instead text.

list.title: Display Title
list.description: Use displayTitle: true option to display title of selected text.

list.title: Display Delimiter
list.description: Use displayDelimiter: \' | \' option to custom the display delimiter.

list.title: Minimum Count Selected
list.description: Use minimumCountSelected: 8 option and the %s of %s selected will be shown only if more than 8 items where selected.

list.title: The Ellipsis
list.description: Use ellipsis: true option to display ... after selected options instead of %s of %s selected.

list.title: Is Open
list.description: Use isOpen: true to open the dropdown by default.

list.title: Keep Open
list.description: Use keepOpen: true to keep the select dropdown always open.

list.title: Open On Hover
list.description: Use openOnHover: true to open the select dropdown by hover instead of click.

list.title: The Container
list.description: Use container option to solve the cut off problem for example parent node is overflow: hidden.

list.title: The Filter
list.description: Use filter: true to enable filter feature.

list.title: Filter Only Optgroup
list.description: Use filterGroup: true to filter optgroups only and not options.

list.title: Filter Placeholder
list.description: Use filterPlaceholder: \'The filter placeholder\' to set the filter placeholder.

list.title: Filter Accept On Enter
list.description: Use filterAcceptOnEnter: true option to speed up keyboard use. Enter filter text and then hit enter or space will auto click select all and close the dropdown.

list.title: Filter By Data Length
list.description: Use filterByDataLength: 10 option to auto enable filter when the data length is more than 10.

list.title: Custom Filter
list.description: Use customFilter to custom filter, in this case we filter by startWith.

list.title: Show Clear
list.description: Use showClear to show the clear icon to uncheck all selected items.

list.title: The Animate
list.description: Use animate to define the animate of open or close the dropdown.

list.title: The Styler
list.description: Use styler to custom the item style.

list.title: Text Template
list.description: Use textTemplate to custom the text template.

list.title: Label Template
list.description: Use labelTemplate to custom the optgroup label template.

list.title: The getOptions
list.description: Use multipleSelect(\'getOptions\') to get the options object.

list.title: The refreshOptions
list.description: Use multipleSelect(\'refreshOptions\', {}) to refresh the options object.

list.title: The setSelects/getSelects
list.description: Use multipleSelect(\'setSelects\', []) and multipleSelect(\'getSelects\') to set selects and get selects.

list.title: The enable/disable
list.description: Use multipleSelect(\'enable\') and multipleSelect(\'disable\') to enable and disable select.

list.title: The open/close
list.description: Use multipleSelect(\'open\') and multipleSelect(\'close\') to open and close the select dropdown list.

list.title: The check/uncheck
list.description: Methods: multipleSelect(\'check\', 2) and multipleSelect(\'uncheck\', 2) to check and uncheck a select option.

list.title: The checkAll/uncheckAll
list.description: Use multipleSelect(\'checkAll\') and multipleSelect(\'uncheckAll\') to check and uncheck all options.

list.title: The checkInvert
list.description: Methods: $select.multipleSelect(\'checkInvert\') to invert check all items.

list.title: The focus/blur
list.description: Use multipleSelect(\'focus\') and multipleSelect(\'blur\') to focus and blur the select.

list.title: The refresh
list.description: Use multiple(\'refresh\') to refresh/reload the Multiple Select. If you\'re dynamically adding/removing option tags on the original select via AJAX or DOM manipulation methods, call refresh to reflect the changes.

list.title: The destroy
list.description: Use multiple(\destroy\') to destroy the select.

list.title: The Events
list.description: Multiple Select has some callback events.

list.title: The i18n
list.description: Custom i18n options.
